main event: Two civilian men in Ramer, Alabama observed an unidentified metallic object maneuvering in the sky on 16 February 1953.
interesting points: The object appeared round at one instant and flat at another,The object was at an altitude of about 15,000 feet and exhibited controlled flight maneuvers,It was observed for a total of 20 minutes,Observers noted the object climbing, diving, and making sharp turns,The object was sighted in the vicinity of an F-86 interceptor but was determined to be unidentified and separate.
sighted object: a metallic looking object that appeared round and flat
witness description: two civilian men with no formal training
